channel.title: Simple Way to Run Two Servers at the Same Time
channel.description:
Well this guide is very easy and short so...Let's get started.
Now I know that you might want to run two of your servers or maybe even three of your servers all at the same time...You just gotta have different Port Numbers. The Ports my all be the same but the Ports are very easy to change, as easy as making someone Mod or Admin! Look in your Source Folders and go to Server.java and search the port number for one of them. Now just delete it and add a different one. I wanted to run two servers at the same time but they were both Default so I channged one to 5555! Simplest thing to do if you understand coding!
Credits: 50% to Me and 50% to Fr33sc4p3

item.title: Simple Way to Run Two Servers at the Same Time
item.dc:creator: @Texasmd91 Texasmd91
item.description:
@Texasmd91 wrote:

[quote=“MoparRocksScape, post:3, topic:80865”]Thanks for the comment Texasmd91! By the way what happened to your server “MEGAscape?”

~Mike[/quote]

I was actually using my neighbors wireless internet for the server, i decided it was really really rude cause it lagged him alot so i stoped the server. and i have no idea where the source went.

i deleted the source from my computer cause i quit pservers for a few months, but im back now. I am working on a server thats going to own, (since i actually know more java now and just not simple java things). but i wont have it as a server, i will just have it as a source where any 1 can download and use.

Read full topic
